full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYUD THAMS CAD KYI RGYAL PO DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I BSKYED RIM KHRID KYI ZIN BRIS RIG 'DZIN YONGS KYI GZHUNG LAM ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJE,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @054A *, ,(CES RGYUD THAMS CAD KYI RGYAL PO DPAL GSANG BA 'DUS PA'I BSKYED RIM KHRID KYI ZIN BRIS RIG 'DZIN YONGS KYI GZHUNG LAM ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RIGS DANG DKYIL 'KHOR THAMS CAD KYI BDAG PO DPAL LDAN BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG CHE PO @055A *, ,DKON MCHOG YAR 'PHEL GYI ZHABS DRUNG NAS, ,CHOS 'DI'I BSKYED RDZOGS KYI NYAMS KHRID SMIN RGYAS ZHUS DUS SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES ZIN BRIS SU BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA'I BSTAN PA'I SNYING PO 'KHRUL BA'I MTHA' THAMS CAD DANG BRAL BA KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO TZONG KHA PA'I BSTAN PA SPYI DANG, KHYAD PAR DU RGYUD SDE RGYA MTSO'I SNYING PO 'DZIN PA'I 'DUS SDE CHEN PO DPAL LDAN SRAD RGYUD PA'I BSHAD SGRUB SDE DANG BCAS PA PHYOGS DUS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,'DI'I RING BRGYUD RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I PAR DU YONGS GRAGS LTAR LA, ,NYE BRGYUD THUN MONG MA YIN PA NI, RGYAL BA RDO RJE 'CHANG RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS, ,KHAMS GSUM CHOS KYI RGYAL PO RJE BDAG NYID CHEN PO, ,DE LA MKHAS GRUB THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA DANG, ,MKHAS GRUB SHER SENG GNYIS KAS GSAN, ,DE GNYIS LA RDO RJE 'CHANG 'DUL NAG PA DPAL LDAN BZANG POS GSAN, ,DE DPON PO 'JAM DBYANGS DGE 'DUN 'PHEL BA, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG BKRA SHIS 'PHAGS PA, 'DUL NAG SPRUL SKU PAn CHEN BSAM 'GRUB RGYA MTSO, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG BRTZON 'GRUS 'PHAGS PA 'DI NAS BRGYUD PA GNYIS KA'I RGYUN YOD, ,MKHAS GRUB RDO RJE BZANG PO, ,'DUL NAG SPRUL SKU RDO RJE 'CHANG SANGS RGYAS RGYA MTSO, ,RGYUD CHEN DKON MCHOG RGYA MTSO, ,RTZA BA'I BLA MA RIGS KUN GYI BDAG PO RDO RJE 'CHANG @055A *, ,DKON MCHOG YAR 'PHEL LA, ,GNAS DPAL LCANG LO CAN GNYIS PA SRANG DGA' LDA CHOS KYI PHO BRANG NAS, ,BDAG 'JAM DBYANGS BZHAD PA'I RDO RJES ZHUS PA'I TSE DGYES BZHIN DU SMIN RGYAS SUU STZAL PA LEGS SO, ,YANG RJE SHER SENG, ,RGYUD CHEN SBYIN PA DPAL, ,RGYUD PA TSUL KHRIMS BZANG PO, ,RTZE BA SHER BZANG, ,RDO RJE 'CHANG CHOS SKYONG RGYA MTSO, ,RGYUD CHEN BRTZON 'GRUS 'PHAGS MAN CHAD SNGAR BZHIN YUN LEGS SO, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
